author: Al Jazeera
title: Israel arrests Palestinian governor of Jerusalem
description: Ghaith's lawyer says he was apprehended primarily due to Palestinian activity related to the coronavirus outbreak.
content:
Israel has arrested the Palestinian governor of Jerusalem, Adnan Ghaith, over "illegal" activities and put him behind bars once again.
The Palestinian Authority (PA) official was arrested by Israel at least six times last year and seven times in less than 18… [+1577 chars]
